'''Crafty Crew''', also known as '''''Minecraft'' x ''Reebok'' Crafty Crew Skin Pack''', is a [[skin pack]] that includes 21 skins promoting the collaboration between ''Minecraft'' and footwear and clothing brand ''{{W|Reebok}}''. It is available through a promo code obtained by purchasing a ''Minecraft''-themed ''Reebok'' hoodie or T-shirt at ''Walmart'' before January 31, 2025.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.walmart.com/brand/reebok/10013131|title=Reebok|website=Walmart.com}}</ref> The promo codes are redeemable until August 15, 2025.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.walmart.com/cp/minecraft-promo/1685719|title=Minecraft Promo|website=Walmart.com}}</ref>
